Nightshift sits forward in his chair with a grin on his face.

" Now that's=
 a good question.  And I got a story ta tell that might answer it for ya.  =
One time, Master Yokitron was holding some basic training in Ninjabot comba=
t, and Rodimus, who is already an established hot shot warrior, was attendi=
ng one of those training exercises.  At the same time, so was Tucson, who a=
ctually continued his Ninjabot training, shortly after the brief session he=
 attended.  Okay, gett'n back ta the story, Rodimus didn't pay too much att=
ention ta Master Yokitron and never went on with the training.  He was kind=
a not with it and liked his warrior style of fighting a lot better. Well, M=
aster Yokitron wanted ta see just how important his training was and asked =
him ta spar with me.  I said okay and I did as Yokitron asked.  Wouldn't ya=
 know, I had Rodimus knocked off his feet in the first ten minutes of the f=
irst session?  He's an awesome fighter as a knight but it didn't serve him =
too well going up against a Ninja.  Warriors are smart, strong and steadfas=
t.  A Ninja is smart, swift, strong, and dexterous.  A perfect balance of s=
kill and agility."  I hope that clears things up for ya."

Perpetually on t=
he move and constantly busy. 

On Sep 2, 2011, at 2:28 PM, Super Cyclonus <=
supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift subspaces the=
 ball bearing and trades it for a Cybertronian
> > katana blade, whirling i=
t gracefully into his hand.
> >
> > " It's all good Wolfgang, just part of =
be'n a Ninjabot. Anyway, I bet
> > Tucson's use'n the same style of combat =
out there. Not too many bots
> > outside of the Ninjabot clan, are familiar=
 with the fighting style." Look
> > for a shimmer of something shinny. That=
 will probably be the tip of his
> > blade."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> WOLFGANG just =
chuckled as he glanced at NIGHTSHIFT and his blade.
> "Most of the time in =
a fight you never know what a person is going to
> do. Being unfamilar with=
 a fighting style is . . . um . . . how shall
> I say it? . . . par for the=
 course."
> 
> Elbowing RAMULUS as he smiled WOLFGANG gestured at NIGHTSHIF=
T, "Tell
> me, who would win in a fight, a Knight or a Ninja?"
> 
> RAMULUS=
 just shook his head and rolled his optics. Obviously he had
> heard this b=
efore.
> 
> Meanwhile the shuttle was coming around and angling for a good =
place
> to set down.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift sits forward in his chair w=
ith a grin on his face.</div><div><br></div><div>" Now that's a good questi=
on.  And I got a story ta tell that might answer it for ya.  One =
time, Master Yokitron was holding some basic training in Ninjabot combat, a=
nd Rodimus, who is already an established hot shot warrior, was attending o=
ne of those training exercises.  At the same time, so was Tucson, who =
actually continued his Ninjabot training, shortly after the brief session h=
e attended.  Okay, gett'n back ta the story, Rodimus didn't pay too mu=
ch attention ta Master Yokitron and never went on with the training.  =
He was kinda not with it and liked his warrior style of fighting a lot bett=
er. Well, Master Yokitron wanted ta see just how important his training was=
 and asked him ta spar with me.  I said okay and I did as Yokitron ask=
ed.  Wouldn't ya know, I had Rodimus knocked off his feet in the first=
 ten minutes of the first session?  He's an awesome fighter as a knigh=
t but it didn't serve him too well going up against a Ninja.  Warriors=
 are smart, strong and steadfast.  A Ninja is smart, swift, strong, an=
d dexterous.  A perfect balance of skill and agility."  I hope th=
at clears things up for ya."<br><br>Perpetually on the move and constantly =
busy. </div><div><br>On Sep 2, 2011, at 2:28 PM, Super Cyclonus <<a=
 href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@...">supercyclonus@...</a>> wr=
ote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"><div>

    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">

      <p>> <OLD><br>
><br>
> Nightshift subspaces the ball=
 bearing and trades it for a Cybertronian<br>
> katana blade, whirling i=
t gracefully into his hand.<br>
><br>
> " It's all good Wolfgang, jus=
t part of be'n a Ninjabot.  Anyway, I bet<br>
> Tucson's use'n the same =
style of combat out there.  Not too many bots<br>
> outside of the Ninja=
bot clan, are familiar with the fighting style."  Look<br>
> for a shimm=
er of something shinny.  That will probably be the tip of his<br>
> blad=
e."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
WOLFGANG just chuckled as he glanced at N=
IGHTSHIFT and his blade.<br>
"Most of the time in a fight you never know wh=
at a person is going to<br>
do. Being unfamilar with a fighting style is . =
. . um . . . how shall<br>
I say it? . . . par for the course."<br>
<br>
El=
bowing RAMULUS as he smiled WOLFGANG gestured at NIGHTSHIFT, "Tell<br>
me, =
who would win in a fight, a Knight or a Ninja?"<br>
<br>
RAMULUS just shook=
 his head and rolled his optics. Obviously he had<br>
heard this before.<br=
>
<br>
Meanwhile the shuttle was coming around and angling for a good place=
<br>
to set down.<br>
<br>
(TAG)<br>
<br>
Preston<br>
